RACE.RACE_TEXT: LOUISIANA DOWNS RACE 1 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 72. Maiden Claiming Purse 10000. FOR MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: TRAFFIC BOSS raced from off of the pace, raced on the rail but never got involved. PRATHER raced from mid pack, raced on the rail and ran an even race through out. ALL IN GOOD TIME was pinched at the start, raced on the rail, improved into a mid pack position, gained ground through the turn, had no kick in the stretch. CRAZY MUGGS raced from off of the pace in the three path, maintained that position through out. ROCKY BOY missed the break, trailed the field by many, found his stride, made one run, bid at the three eighths pole, edged into the six path as he circled the field in the turn, shifted eight wide in the upper stretch and was encouraged, where he responded well closing hitting his best stride late. KILO KEY raced from mid pack, travelled in the three path, was in between rivals, but to no avail. TEXAS ADOPTER raced from off the pace, moved at the three eighths pole, bid at the quarter pole, raced six wide in the stretch, and had no rally. MO HAWK MAN stalked the pace from the three path, edged into the five path, launched a bid at the three eighths pole, circled the field in the fie path through the turn, challenged and took over the second place spot by the quarter pole, tried to chase down the winner but could not get there today, still ran a game second. ASTERN BANKER raced from the middle of the field, in four path, patiently maintained, launched a bid at the quarter pole, closed willingly, struggled with his leads but still got up for third. SEA FORCE vied for the lead, matched strides with another rival gunning for the lead, took back and stalked, edged out into the four path and launched a bid at the three eighths pole, circled the field, took command in the upper stretch and drew off for the win. SACRAMENT vied for the lead, matched strides with another rival while establishing the lead, led and raced in the three path, launched a bid at the three eighths pole, then tired.

ENTRY.NAME: Traffic Boss
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace, rail, neverinvolved

ENTRY.NAME: Prather
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack, rail, saved ground, ran even

ENTRY.NAME: All in Good Time
ENTRY.COMMENT: pinched start, rail, improved, no late kick

ENTRY.NAME: Crazy Muggs
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace, 3w, maintained that position through out

ENTRY.NAME: Rocky Boy
ENTRY.COMMENT: missed break, trailed, one run, bid 3/8, 6w, 8wupper, best stride

ENTRY.NAME: Kilo Key
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack, 3w, between, made no impact

ENTRY.NAME: Texas Adopter
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace, bid 1/4, 6 wide, circled turn, no rally

ENTRY.NAME: Mo Hawk Man
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked, 3w, edged out 5w, bid 3/8, circled, 2nd by 1/4, chased

ENTRY.NAME: Astern Banker
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack, 4w, bid 1/4, closed willingly, getting up for third

ENTRY.NAME: Sea Force
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied, matched for lead, stalked, bid 3/8, circled, drew off

ENTRY.NAME: Sacrament
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied, matched,led, tired

RACE.RACE_TEXT: LOUISIANA DOWNS RACE 2 1 1/16M Turf CR: 77. Claiming Purse 12000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $12,500, if for $10,000, allowed 2 lbs. (If deemed inadvisable by management to run this race over the turf course, it will be run on the main track at 1 1/16 Miles) (Rail at 20 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CRAZY RIDGE vied for the lead, stalked the front runner from the rail, patiently waited, was cued at the half mile pole. willingly took the lead and set the remainder of the fractions to his liking and drew off for the lead. ALLIGATOR CRAWL was off of the pace and trailed the field from the rail, launched a bid at the half mile pole, raced between foes, inched out into the three path at the three eighths pole, advanced through the turn, angled out into the eight path in the upper stretch and closed willingly getting up for second place honors today. THUNDER ROAD raced off of the pace, raced in the three path, moved at the half mile marker, inched out into the four path and raced i n between foes through the turn, continued to improve down the stretch out finishing the rest getting up for third. CHROME RUN raced from the middle of the field in the three path, shifted into the seven path in the turn and even further out in the stretch, was encouraged bu there was not enough today. NINEJUANJUAN CALL was off mid pack, raced on the rail, and raced on even race. KINGPRIN stalked the pace setters from the three path, maintained good positioning into the stretch drive, then faded in the furlong ground. TEXAS TRILOGY raced from off of the pace, stayed in the three path, and showed mild improvement in the furlong round. PLENTY OF CENTS stalked the leaders from thee four path but made no impact. BUCK'S GLORY raced from mid pack, on the rail, then faded after the half. DIRECTIONAL vied for the lead, raced in the two path,, briefly led, but over all showed ittle.

ENTRY.NAME: Alligator Crawl
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed, rail, bid 1/2, edged out 3w, split foes turn, 8wupper,

ENTRY.NAME: Thunder Road
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace, 3w, bid1/2, 4w, between, out finished the rest

ENTRY.NAME: Buck's Glory
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack, rail, faded after the half

ENTRY.NAME: Ninejuanjuan Call
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack, rail, raced an even race

ENTRY.NAME: Texas Trilogy
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace, 3w, trailed, mild improvement

ENTRY.NAME: Plenty of Cents
ENTRY.OWNER: Cooper Juan K and Thomas Otis
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked, 4w, made no impact

ENTRY.NAME: Chrome Run
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack, 3w, bid 3/8, 7 wide, upper,

ENTRY.NAME: Crazy Ridge
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied, stalked, rail, led 1/2, drew off

ENTRY.NAME: Kingprin
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked, 3w, maintained into the stretch drive then faded

ENTRY.NAME: Directional
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied, led, 2w, showed little

RACE.RACE_TEXT: LOUISIANA DOWNS RACE 3 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 54. Claiming Purse 13000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: GUANAJUATO was hustled out of the gates, then established a stalking position, stalked the leader from the three path, launched a bid at the thee eights pole, happily took command at the five sixteenth pole, and showed the rest of the way to the wire for an easy win. GRACE'S SOLDIER was off in the middle of the field, raced three wide, launched a bid at the three eighths pole, gained ground through the turn, closed well in the stretch drive, could not get to the winner but was second best. PERIPHERAL VISION was off mid pack, raced on the rail, and raced an even race. SAVANNAH'S HERE vied for the lead, led in the two path, set the early fractions, was collared at the five sixteenth pole and relinquished the lead, chased that rival into the furlong grounds then stopped. LIVVY LOU showed little. DONTFORGETRDREAMS trailed through out.

ENTRY.NAME: Dontforgetrdreams
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed through out

ENTRY.NAME: Peripheral Vision
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack, rail, raced even

ENTRY.NAME: Savannah's Here
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied, led, 2w, relinquished lead, 5-16th, chased, stopped

ENTRY.NAME: Grace's Soldier
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack, 3w, bid 3/8, gained ground turn, closed, second best

ENTRY.NAME: Livvy Lou
ENTRY.COMMENT: showed little

ENTRY.NAME: Guanajuato
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled, stalked, 3w, bid 3/8, led 5-16th, easy winner

RACE.RACE_TEXT: LOUISIANA DOWNS RACE 4 7F Dirt CR: 72. Claiming Purse 12000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $7,500.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ABBY THE BULL DAWG raced from off of the pace, raced in the three path, launched a bid at the three eighths pole, gained ground through the turn, shifted into the seven path in the upper stretch, lugged in a bit, was corrected, struggled with he leads, and still closed with force, was bale to zoom past the field and take the win. NAVAGATIONALBEACON stalked the front runner from the four path, moved at the half, bid 3/8, took command by the five sixteenth pole, was caught by a fast closing rival in the last sixteenth but was able to hold sway for second. SODDY DAISY stalked the early pace setters, raced in the three path, launched a bid at the three eighths pole, saved ground through out an closed well. GURKHA GOLD (IRE) raced from off of the pace in the three path, launched a bid at the three eighths pole, shifted into the six path in the upper stretch and closed willingly, had to much to do. INDY LOVER was off in the middle of the pack, raced on the rail, saved ground through out, but had no kick. MISS DARLENE was off in the middle of the field, 4raced four wide, circled in the five path through the turn, had improved position then faded in the stretch drive. PEACEFUL MOMENT stalked the leader, raced on the rail, launched a bid at the three eighths pole, led by the five sixteenth pole, then was caught by the quarter pole, then briefly chased the eventual winner, then tired. FUHR MEO vied for the lead, led , raced in the two path then faded after a half of a mile. WAIT ON ME showed little. BATTLE OF WITS mid pack, faltered, jogged across the wire. BATTLE OF WITS WALKED OFF AFTER CROSSING THE WIRE.

ENTRY.NAME: Peaceful Moment
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked, rail, bid 3/8, challenged , led 5-16th, chased 1/4,

ENTRY.NAME: Fuhr Meo
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied, led 2w, faded after the half`

ENTRY.NAME: Indy Lover
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack, rail, saved ground, no kick

ENTRY.COMMENT: showed little

ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace, 3w, bid 3/8, shifted 6 wide, upper, closed

ENTRY.OWNER: Wood David and Dunn John Michael

ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked, 4w, moved 1/2, bid 3/8, led 5-16th, caught late, 2nd bst

RACE.RACE_TEXT: LOUISIANA DOWNS RACE 5 1M 70Y Dirt CR: 83. Claiming Purse 15000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $7,500.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: INTO WISHING raced mid pack in the six path, launched a bide at the three eighths pole, challenged for the lead at the five sixteenth pole, battled for a few strides, led by the quarter pole and drew off from there. MIND ON MY MONEY stalked the leader from the four path, challenged for the lead at the three eighths pole, took the lead at he five sixteenth pole, surrendered the lead by the quarter pole, chased the eventual winner to the wire, running second. JUJU NINETEEN raced from the middle of the pack, stayed in the three path, launched a id at the half, was encouraged through the turn, closed well getting up for thirde. UNFATHOMED raced in the middle of the filed, stayed in the two path but could neve get involved. THE THIMBLE vied for the lead, raced in the two path while setting the early pace, was under pressure an gave way at he five sixteenth pole. J B GRAY flashed early speed. BODEE BODEE trailed through out.

ENTRY.NAME: Unfathomed
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack, 2w,,neverinvolved

ENTRY.NAME: The Thimble
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied, led, 2w, faded

ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked, 4w, challenged 3/8, led 5-16th, chased 1/4, second best

ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed through out

ENTRY.NAME: J B Gray
ENTRY.COMMENT: flashed early speed

ENTRY.NAME: Juju Nineteen
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack, 3w, bid 1/2, encouraged turn, closed, up for third

ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack, 6w, bid 3/8, challenged 5-16th, led 1/4, drew off

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Carrol J. Castille & Estate of AllenGuillotte Sr

RACE.RACE_TEXT: LOUISIANA DOWNS RACE 6 1M Turf CR: 95. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 26000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES OR WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES IN 2023 OR CLAIMING PRICE $35,000. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over On The Turf Allowed 2 l bs. Claiming Price $35,000. (If deemed inadvisable by management to run this race over the turf course, it will be run on the main track at 1 Mile and 70 Yards) (Rail at 20 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: NORAH G broke sharp, took control, did everything her way and scored a game wire to wire win. LADY JEOPARDY stalked the eventual winner from the two path, raced in between rivals, saved ground, was challenged in the upper stretch, battled with that foe, briefly came out nearly hitting that rival, was quickly corrected, re focused and held sway fpr second. JUST PASSING THRU was off mid pack, raced five wide, circled the field in the turn, drew next to a rival chasing in second place, drew next to that one and challenged for second, but could not sustain the bid running third. FOR HARPER raced mid pack, saved ground, raced on the rail but was never involved. MONEY WELL SPENT raced in mid pack, five wide, ran an even race. IT'SFIFTYSHADETIME showed little. NO MAS TEQUILA raced mid pack in the three path, raced in between foes to no avail. EVE'S DELIGHT flashed early speed. BIRDIE CALL stalked the pace, was rated in the three path, improved then faltered. IZATIZ trailed through out.

ENTRY.NAME: For Harper
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack, rail, never involved

ENTRY.NAME: Eve's Delight
ENTRY.COMMENT: flashed early speed

ENTRY.NAME: Just Passing Thru
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack, 5w, circled turn, battled, could not sustain the bid,

ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack, 3w, between, no avail

ENTRY.NAME: Norah G
ENTRY.COMMENT: wire to wire, much the best

ENTRY.COMMENT: showed little

ENTRY.NAME: Lady Jeopardy
ENTRY.OWNER: Salome Robert Joseph and Salome Dana
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked, 2w, between, saved ground, battled, held sway

ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked, rated, 3w, faltered

RACE.RACE_TEXT: LOUISIANA DOWNS RACE 7 6F Dirt CR: 82. Allowance Purse 28000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since July 27, 2023 Allowed 2 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SCOOTERIA stalked the front runner form the three path, patiently waited, was given the cue, willingly advanced and went past the leader, taking control at the quarter pole and drawing off for the win. BETTABE BOURBON vied for the lead, stalked the pace, challenged after the three eighths pole, battled until the quarter pole, settled for second. VETERANS DAY raced from id pack in the two path, bid three eighths pole, hit his best stride late. SONO flashed early speed. BIG BOO showed little. CALCULATED made no impact. OCEOLA mid pack, faltered.
